programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Brazil's largest bank robbery; at the heart of the brazen heist is South America's most dangerous gang and its raid on what's is known as the Night of Terror.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: IM Academy sold a dream of financial freedom; but behind the luxury lifestyles and Instagram hype, thousands found themselves inside a multi-level marketing maze that left many broke and broken.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The Green Bible is the single-most important document in the Italian government's war against an alleged Nigerian mafia; but this supposed mafia handbook isn't what it claims to be at all.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: The tale of the strange life and stranger murder of a rare violin collector and his daughter, as told by their friends and two suspects at the heart of the police investigation.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet
programme.desc: Nikolaj begins his global journey to find out how to tell dusk from dawn in the age of climate change; from the scientists behind carbon neutral jet fuel to the oceanographer creating cloud cover for the Great Barrier Reef, the answer becomes clear.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet
programme.desc: Shelter is one of humanity's most basic needs; but as the global population grows, so does the construction industry's environmental footprint.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet
programme.desc: A look at nature's amazing ability to regenerate, and how we can harness this innate power to solve the problems we face.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet
programme.desc: Global warming has made growing food much harder and a need to adapt to climate change is highly important; Nikolaj explores how people can rethink what they plant, where they plant it and how they harvest and prepare it.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet
programme.desc: Nikolaj meets some inspiring engineers, mechanics and entrepreneurs who may have solutions to help humans continue moving in environmentally friendly ways.

programme.title: An Optimist's Guide to the Planet
programme.desc: Nikolaj's journey toward hope continues as he searches for innovators transforming and revitalizing the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: IM Academy sold a dream of financial freedom; but behind the luxury lifestyles and Instagram hype, thousands found themselves inside a multi-level marketing maze that left many broke and broken.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In Texas, a former preacher exploited the trust of his peers under a cloak of religious virtue; this is the intimate story of those whose lives were destroyed by his $38 million dollar Ponzi scheme.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Fake permits, undercover informants and millions of dollars are involved; a US government agency works to prove suppliers to research labs import wild monkeys from Cambodia with false paperwork.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: An estimated $1 trillion lost globally to fraud; with law enforcement struggling to cope, scambaiter vigilantes are filling the gaps.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: In a remote village temple in India, a daring heist saw precious and ancient cultural heritage disappear; two citizen detectives work to bring down one of the biggest art thieves in history.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: A "shadow fleet" of aging tankers is keeping Russian oil flowing; Bloomberg set out to uncover the network of intermediaries working to sell the Kremlin's oil while getting rich in the process.

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: Finance is an industry dominated by men, but women are rising and controlling more wealth globally; how did the women of Wall Street break through, and what's changing now that they have?

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: There's been a migration of financial powerbrokers to South Florida in recent years, drawn by various factors. It's hard to imagine the capital of finance leaving New York, but Wall Street South is getting bigger every day.

programme.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
programme.desc: Wall Street pros often play poker, chess, blackjack and other games that rely on skills that are highly transferable to their work; the lines between finance and gaming are blurring faster than ever.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin reveals the burgeoning role of India's private space firms and their recent advances; learning how they are pushing the boundaries of space through interviews with leaders and innovators.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: Haslina Amin reveals how Korean Pop culture is reshaping Seoul, blending tradition with innovation while providing the world a new wave to follow.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: Joining Haslinda Amin as she explores the way robots and AI are integrated into Japanese life; from drones managing crops to unmanned harvesters, how AI is paving the way to a more efficient future.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: South Korea is emerging as a pivotal force in reshaping maritime transportation, leading the way to a future with autonomous ships and more eco-friendly propulsion systems.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: Haslinda Amin explores Singapore, which has transformed itself from a colonial outpost into a metropolis boasting unparalleled infrastructure, seamless transportation and accessible housing.

programme.title: Momentum
programme.desc: Japan's semiconductor industry is undergoing a resurgence, with both established corporations and new startups driving innovation; this transformation provides valuable insights for global tech development.

programme.title: Roblox's Predator Problem
programme.desc: Tens of millions of kids play Roblox daily, but is the internet's playground safe? Bloomberg investigates cases of predators who have used the platform to groom and sometimes meet kids in real life.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets NBA player and Thirty Ink CEO Stephen Curry to discuss his growing business portfolio, partnership with Under Armour and retail ambitions to rival Nike's Jordan Brand; Chang also takes some swings on the golf course with Curry.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Endeavor and TKO CEO Ari Emanuel to discuss how he built a multi-billion dollar sports and entertainment empire; she discusses the future of Hollywood and what's next for his company as it prepares to go private.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang visits Fidji Simo's hometown in southern France; they discuss Simo's journey from a small fishing village to becoming the CEO of Instacart and a Silicon Valley leader.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang explores Stargate, a $500 billion AI project; she interviews OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son about their vision for the initiative.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang goes inside Stargate, an historic $500 billion bet on the future of AI; she speaks with OpenAI CEO Sam Altman and Softbank CEO Masayoshi Son about their hopes for the project.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Melinda French Gates in Seattle to discuss how she's navigating her next stage as a philanthropist and investor.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Lawyer Alex Spiro discusses how he navigates the high-stakes world of litigation on behalf of famous clients like Elon Musk, Jay-Z, Megan Thee Stallion and Alec Baldwin.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang meets Salesforce Co-Founder and CEO Marc Benioff to discuss the rise of AI agents and what it's like to run a global tech company.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang speaks with Microsoft titans Bill Gates, Steve Ballmer and Satya Nadella about the company's journey from scrappy startup to global powerhouse.

programme.title: The Circuit
programme.desc: Emily Chang visits Airbnb CEO Brian Chesky at his San Francisco home to discuss the highs and lows of Airbnb's success and his hopes for a more connected future; Chang and Chesky also swap perspectives on AI during a cookie bake-off.
